Let a class of canvassers be fitted up, by thorough instruction and drill, to handle the publications that shall 

298 

come forth from the press. Those who take up the work of canvassing as a preparation for the ministry will indeed realize the truth of the Saviour's words, "He shall glorify me: for he shall receive of mine, and shall shew it unto you" (John 16:14).--Lt 66, 1901.
